name: Offroad Police Legends 2016 – Extreme 4x4 border driving & Virtual Steering Ultra Simulator
name_original: Offroad Police Legends 2016 – Extreme 4x4 border driving & Virtual Steering Ultra Simulator
description:
Extreme Drift Adventure awaits Police car driver on the off road mountain trails. Rip down the track at 10,000 horsepower. A real driving simulator across the border without any crime chase. Test your police driver skills in the hill climb deepest rugged trails and competitive paths.

Police Driver experts in Chicago and San Andreas. Try your hand in the newest offroad 4x4 police simulator. Drive carefully over the bridges under construction. A perfect adventure in the open vast offroad environment.
